important: There is a scam website that customers are texting in from (https://heydudestores.com/)
If you notice this, reroute customers to the correct website!
send_to_cs: Don't ESC post-purchase issues, use PPI shortcut
templates: For wrong items received use WMP shortcut
For damaged items received use DMI shortcut
For order status requests use OSR shortcut
promo_and_exclusions: The welcome code is valid for first-time customers only.
➜ Can't be combined with any other discounts or offers, including sale styles
➜  Use cww temp for code issues
The promotional price shown on the Heydude website may not always be guaranteed when cx is redirected to Prime for purchase if the item is out of stock

conversation.message_text: HEYDUDE: Welcome to HEYDUDE! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel. Privacy: attnl.tv/p/o76

HEYDUDE: We're so stoked you're here!

Get 20% off your first purchase with code ATTWDAR4DEX2 at checkout.

Shop Now:
https://heydudeshoes.attn.tv/auN6FhwVISP0 .

HEYDUDE: Over the next few days we'll try to help you find something that you will love!

Until then, shop our viral best-sellers: https://heydudeshoes.attn.tv/acqt4VE2w9Uw .

HEYDUDE: We're so pumped for you to get your new shoes!

While you wait, check out our newest arrivals:
heydudeshoes.attn.tv/abGg-fRyZvqC .
I didn't get a receipt. Can you send one?
HEYDUDE: I'm sorry to hear that! We sent you a confirmation email. Just to be sure, did you check your spam/promo folders already? Our emails can end up there sometimes.
Please Send another email to Ginnie.Harwood@gmail.com
I still haven't gotten it and not in spam
Template used: "Post Purchase Inquiries"; last updated: 2024-02-12 22:33:07.578

HEYDUDE: Sorry, I can't change the email address associated with your order or send the confirmation email to your new email on my end. We don't handle post-purchase requests via text and the fastest way to get help with your order is to email us at customerservice@heydude.com. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!
